Label: Data Holder
Definition: Natural or legal person with access to health data (draft definition)
Usage: to extend in GDNG and EHDS extensions
Source: none, but based on GDNG's definition

Label: Data User
Definition: Natural or legal person requested or obtained access to health data (draft definition)
Usage: to extend in GDNG and EHDS extensions
Source: none, but based on GDNG's definition
